item.description:
I am going to plan to be at the casino at 5:00 p.m. at Genos Fast Break Pub. There are 2 Genos Fast Breaks at the casino, with one being in the food court, but I will be at the one that has a pub. I am not sure if we can get seating here or not, but I guess we can kind of wing it for food, and go somewhere else if we cannot.

If you are not planning on going to the restaurant, it will be important to be at the Wolf Den at 6:00 p.m. if we want to get a seat for the show. If we are late there is a chance we might not get a seat. There are also some people that are working on some car pooling plans on the active singles website if there is an interest for that.

The Wolf Den and JB`s are both free so that cannot be beat!If you are going to go to the restaurant please let me know so I will know who to look for.
item.name: The Nitty Gritty Dirt Band followed by Jimmy Buffets Margaritaville!
